"Hey, senpai!":
"Seeing you here means that you've
already settled down a bit right?"
"I thought it would be troublesome if I bothered you so soon after waking, and you were probably busy anyway. So I waited here, so that I wouldn't get in your way."
"I wonder... How long has it been since we're able to meet each other?"

"I've heard that you've been sleeping for
a while... It's not that I'm worried but-
it's more assuring to meet up and talk with you."
"I know you're thinking it's not a big deal, but it was quite a long time for everyone who wasn't sleeping."
"Y-You think so? Well, I mean- if time goes by, even I'll mature, you know?"
"B-beautiful? Y-you've been away for some time now, after all. I'm capable of growth too, you know?"
"You know senpai, trying to embarrass me by saying something weird is a waste of time."
"I've gotten used to being teased, I won't be put off balance just by that..."
"Jeez, you always act so suddenly! If you do too many strange things, I'm going to tell Matoi!"
"Haha, when we have these exchanges, it feels like you've truly come back."

"I know I'm late doing it, but...
Welcome back, senpai. I've been waiting."
"You can now call Io (EP4) as a partner."
